channel.title: Events on Grupa Wolne
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Grupa Wolne

item.title: Thursdays Off
item.description: Thursdays Off is a weekly, free event to which we invite young people, who have experienced migration, but not only. We meet at 5 PM at Inclsv Buzz at Zbawiciela Square. We have a base and free time on our hands, what happens next depends on the weather and on what we want to do. On sunny days, we will offer you trips and games in the open air: bicycles, walks, Frisbee, bonfires.
